bill_title: exempt firearms from retail sales tax and use tax.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to exempt firearms from retail sales tax and use tax. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That a NEW SECTION be added: 10-45-114. Exemption for sale of firearms or ammunition. There are hereby specifically exempted from the provisions of this chapter and from the computation of the amount of tax imposed by it, gross receipts from the sale of firearms or ammunition. Terms used in this section mean: (1) "Ammunition," a cartridge, shell, or any other device containing gunpowder designed and intended for use in a firearm; (2) "Firearm," a weapon from which a projectile or projectiles may be discharged by gunpowder; and (3) "Gunpowder," any propellant that upon oxidation emits heat and light. Section 2. That a NEW SECTION be added: 10-46-74. Exemption for sale of firearms or ammunition. There are hereby specifically exempted from the provisions of this chapter and from the computation of the amount of tax imposed by it, gross receipts from the sale of firearms or ammunition. Terms used in this section mean: (1) "Ammunition," a cartridge, shell, or any other device containing gunpowder designed and intended for use in a firearm; (2) "Firearm," a weapon from which a projectile or projectiles may be discharged by gunpowder; and (3) "Gunpowder," any propellant that upon oxidation emits heat and light.
